content: Xinjie Yao is an undergraduate student at HKUST majoring in Computer Engineering and Business Management. Her research interests include percetion and planning for autonomous robots in dynamic environments. She is working as an undergraduate research assistant with HKUST UAV group on relative localization in Swarm UAVs.

title: Xinjie Yao (Abby)
